attributes.action: UK government to cut ties with Russia over LGBT abuses.
attributes.additional_details:
Recently media have reported that gay men in the Russian Federation country of Chechnya have been rounded up and taken to a concentration camp similar to that of Nazi Germany. Three people have reported to have died.

As a country with good human rights we cannot sit back and do nothing. If we show Russia we don't support things like this then that will hopefully send a powerful message. 

Please show your support if you support LGBT and human rights.
attributes.background: In recent year's Putin introduced the anti gay law making it illegal for people of LGBT persuasion to express themselves due to them promoting the "gay lifestyle". I am urging the UK to cut all ties with the Russian government over issues such as trade.
